 
Aadil wants to code a message for his girlfriend so he wants your help. Replace every character by its position in alphabet sequence to the power 2, separate every alphabet in a word by '-' symbol and separate every word in a sentence by '$'.
The position of string is 0 index based.All the alphabets will be in small letters.
 

Input

The first line of the input contains an integer T denoting the number of test cases. The description of T test cases follows.
Each test case contain a single string i-e  message to be coded 

 

Output

For each test case, output a single line containing the string i.e CodedMessage

 

Constraints
 

1  ≤T≤100
1 ≤ |message| ≤10^5

 

Example
Input:1
abcde fgh ijkl

Output:
0-1-4-9-16$25-36-49$64-81-100-121
